description:

No matter what you're looking for, Temu has you covered, including fashion, home decor, handmade crafts, beauty & cosmetics, clothing, shoes, and more.

Download Temu today and enjoy incredible deals daily.

The My dm app has many attractive advantages and features!

Shopping with your smart handheld device? The My dm app has many attractive advantages, useful features and exciting services, and allows you to conveniently shop for your favourite products.

Log in using your existing My dm account. The app will then be tailored to your personal needs.

Download the app and get started
1. Download the My dm app to your smartphone
2. Log in with your My dm account credentials or register for a new customer account.

The best functions at a glance

Get an overview of the product range
Our search function, all the product categories and our scan function give you a quick and easy overview of the product range. Simply click through our assortment, search for specific brands or scan products, view products you’ve purchased previously, add them to your watch list, share your watch list with friends or shop directly.

Find your local store
You can search for stores near you with direct access to the store finder. This gives you quick and easy access to service information. You can save your preferred store in the app and thus display the available stock on the product pages in addition to the online availability.

Your opinion is what matters
We want to constantly improve our app. That’s why we welcome your feedback. Simply use our feedback section to let us know what you think. Please note that you will not receive confirmation when you send feedback. If you have any further questions or problems with the app, please refer to ‘Help & FAQs’ or use our contact form.

Oficijelna OLX.ba iOS aplikacija.

Ispunili smo našu misiju, postali centralno kupoprodajno mjesto u BiH. Od momenta predstavljanja prve verzije iOS aplikacije u aprilu 2012. godine, nastojali smo uvesti razna poboljšanja koja bi olakšala korištenje OLX-a. Smatramo da smo ovog puta lansirali verziju koja nudi moštvo traženih opcija, a koja je rezultat višemjesečnog rada i slušanja korisničkih zahtjeva.

Želimo čuti vaše komentare, kritike i prijedloge, te na taj način u narednoj verziji ponuditi još mnogo olakšica za što lakše, mobilnije i uspješnije poslovanje.

Vaš OLX.ba

Discover the Zara collection with proposals for Women, Men and Kids. Through our application and our online store, you can shop and see all our new collections and fashion editorials for the upcoming seasons. 


Woman: 
Among Zara's proposals for women are the following categories of clothing and accessories: 
-	Shirts 
-	T-shirts/Bodysuits
-	Tops

Man:
The Zara Collection for men includes:

Kids:
A selection for garments, accessories and shoes for: 
-	Girl: 6–⁠14 years
-	Boy: 6–⁠14 years
-	Baby girl: 9 months - 6 years
-	Baby boy: 9 months - 6 years
-	Newborn: 0-12 months
	
In addition, Zara's children's collection includes its Edited/customisable section, a selection of customisable clothing and accessories that is updated weekly. 


In addition to our permanent collections, with our Zara App you can find all our special launches, our beauty category and our lingerie line. 

Other utilities of the Zara App are:  
-	Favourites: Use your favourites list to save all the clothes and accessories you like.
-	Easy, intuitive and fast tracking of orders and returns. Track your order in each part of the process. 
-	Find your nearest Zara store. 
-	Activate notifications and receive information about new arrivals, launchings, special collections... 


Store mode 
-	Use your application in ""store mode"" when you are shopping in any of our stores and use all its features to improve your experience. 


Zara QR:
Use your QR on the Zara App for: 
-	Having associated all of your purchases online and at physical stores. At a physical store, identify yourself at the till with your Zara QR code and request an e-receipt.
-	In-store returns for both online and in-store purchases.
-	Collect all of your online orders at a physical store.

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

The Stradivarius spring Collection has arrived!

Discover our App for a complete experience: explore new items, add your favorite garments, enjoy the best looks, and shop with just one click.

Stradivarius is the online women's clothing store you've been searching for. A brand that adapts to current fashion trends. All the summer, spring, winter, and autumn trends at your fingertips. Welcome to the Stradivarius App.

With the Stradivarius app, you will receive the most anticipated notifications so you can stay trendy and not miss the garment of the moment. We have different types of sections: New Collection, Clothing, STR Teen, Shoes, Accessories, and much more.

STRADIVARIUS, the online clothing store for women. All the benefits of our app include:

  - STORE LOCATOR: Find all the outfits and best looks at your nearest store by activating geolocation on your device. Are you ready to go shopping at your nearest store? Remember, if you prefer, you can always shop directly in our online stores or from the Stradivarius app.

  - QR CODE AND VOICE SEARCH: Scan the QR code on the tag of the look you are searching for or use voice search to find the perfect outfit.

  - E-TICKET: Use the electronic ticket option to save all your online purchases in your app.

  - TRACKING NOTIFICATIONS: Enable automatic notifications to stay up-to-date on all news, fashion trends, new looks, and when your order will arrive.

  - WISHLIST: Add your favorite outfits and online clothes to your wishlist to create the best looks of the season.

  - ONE-CLICK PURCHASE: Save your credit or debit card to make purchases in the Stradivarius app with a single click.

  - MANAGE YOUR PROFILE: From the app, you can manage your personal data, address, favorite stores, and reservations you have made at Stradivarius physical stores.

The filter in the app is available to easily find the latest trends: clothing, shoes, accessories... save your favorite outfits to your wishlist and shop for all the clothes in our online or physical stores.

Show off the best looks and outfits with Stradivarius discounts at all our stores!

Discover a new way to shop online for women's clothing and also create a wishlist with your favorite looks, outfits, and fashion.

Shop online easily and find the best women's looks in the online store, manage your orders, and complete your favorite fashion outfits. You'll find dresses, t-shirts, shirts, jeans, pants, shoes, and any accessory— the best looks for this season!

Haven't downloaded the Stradivarius app yet?

Choose the best online clothes to combine your outfits, stay fashionable and comfortable every day. You can also create a wishlist with your favorite online clothing and the best looks, pay in stores, and find the best outfits at the nearest stores.

Don't wait any longer and download the Stradivarius app, your favorite online clothing store with the latest trends in fashion.

In the app, BESTSECRET members can manage orders, add to their wish list, and shop their favourites anytime, anywhere, for a secure and seamless shopping experience.

Your top app for online fashion shopping in Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates, Kuwait, Egypt, and Qatar.  Download the H&M app and shop all fashion clothing and accessories such as:

- Women's clothes and accessories including dresses, tops, t-shirts shirts & blouses,hoodies, trousers, shorts, skirts, jumpsuits, cardigans, loungewear, nightwear, lingerie, swimwear, shoes,bags, jewelry, and more.
- Men's clothes and accessories including t-shirts, shirts,hoodies, jackets, blazers, suits, trousers, shorts, loungewear, nightwear,swimwear, shoes, caps,socks, and more.
- Kids' clothes and accessories for boys and girls of all ages.
- Beauty and cosmetics products including makeup for face, eyes, lips, as well as make up bags, perfumes, and more.
- H&M Home products including living room, bedroom, kitchen, bathroom & kids' room decorations & accessories, furniture, glassware, kitchenware, blankets, rugs, bed linen, and more.
-Explore sportswear you can rely on, whatever the move. By H&M Move.Go for new sportswear to step up the game. Feel good. Look awesome.Your perfect sport tights are your trusty and stylish companions, whether you're sweating in the gym or binge streaming on the couch
Activate push notifications for the app to stay updated with the newest clothes collections and our exclusive online offers, promotions, and discounts. Enjoy a smooth and fun online fashion shopping experience with the app's features including the ability to track your orders step by step from buying them online till their delivery and saving the items you want to have to your wish list to purchase later.

Don't miss out on our best clothes collections and online shopping offers and download the H&M app now. When you download the H&M app, we will process your data in accordance with our privacy notice. For more details on this, please visit https://kw.hm.com/en/privacy-policy/

With the Pull&Bear app you get full access to the store, where you can shop for clothes online and discover the latest new arrivals and trends for the autumn-winter season for her (jackets, denim, biker jackets, jumpers, blouses, jeans, boots...) and for him (hoodies, oversize T-shirts, trousers, coats, cardigans, trainers...), and accessories for both (bags, scarves, hats, hair clips or wallets).

Enjoy quick and direct access to all Pull&Bear collections at any time and pick your favourites from the comfort of your home. Download it and create more outfit ideas than you could ever imagine, for any occasion!

- PBShuffle – An innovative shopping experience in video format. 

- Wishlist - You can create a wish list and save the products you like most. Don’t let your favourites get away! 

- Geolocation - Find the Pull&Bear store nearest you, as well as other collection points. You can also see their locations on the map. 

-Customisation – Product recommendations to suit your tastes. 

- Fashion trends - Get inspired by the new products that arrive each week, as well as our editorials. 

Dive into an unmatched shopping experience, giving you full access to our online store where you can indulge in the latest fashion and explore the most vanguard trends of the season. 

For her, hoodies, stylish party dresses, shoes and fashion trainers that will let you step out in style, or blazers and waistcoats with trendy prints, like animal print or geometric shapes. Don't forget to explore our selection of jeans tailored to your unique style.

For him, denim jackets with a vintage touch, trousers and jeans that blend comfort and style, knit sweaters that express personality and jackets, hoodies and trainers that stand out on any occasion.

In addition to the coolest fashion, the Pull&Bear app also invites you to explore a wide range of accessories for both genders. Find bags that complement your style, hats that add a touch of elegance, scarves and gloves to keep out the cold, jewellery, backpacks that are both practical and stylish and phone cases that reflect your personality. With our quick and direct access, you can explore all Pull&Bear collections at any time and select your favourite garments in just a few clicks, all from the comfort of your home. Don’t miss the opportunity to download our app and unleash your creativity by designing an endless variety of outfits for every occasion. Pull&Bear accompanies you at every step of your fashion journey, ensuring you’re always at the forefront of trends and ready to stand out with your unique style. Download the app now and discover a world of fashion at your fingertips!

Are you always searching for the latest trends? Do you love discovering new outfits? 
Do you always go for looks that are a hit wherever you go? Then this is the place for you! 

Download the Bershka app now and discover a new way of buying clothes and fashion online, view fashion items on a daily basis, see the latest trends for him and for her, manage your account and find the nearest stores.


THE COMPLETE BERSHKA CATALOGUE IS WITHIN REACH 


With the Bershka app, you will get access to the online store and can buy clothes in the most comfortable way, get the latest news, the latest fashion trends and items, women’s clothing (dresses, coats, shirts, skirts, blouses, boots…) men’s clothing (trousers, shirts, jackets, t-shirts, shoes…) and accessories (bags, purses, jewellery, belts…) as well as beauty and make-up. 

CREATE A WISH LIST WITH ALL THE ITEMS YOU LOVE 

You can do more than just buy clothes. You can also look at the complete catalogue, select the items that you like the most, choose complete outfits, and make a list of the latest trends for your next shopping trip - choose what you love best! 

MANAGE YOUR ACCOUNT 

With the app, you can do more than just buy clothes. 
You can also manage your orders, keep track of your online purchases, contact the customer service team if you have any questions and recommend the app to your friends. 

DISCOVER THE STORES CLOSEST TO YOU 

Thanks to geolocation, the app can tell you where the nearest store is and whether the store sells womenswear, menswear or both, and also provides you with a contact number for the store in case you want to order a specific item. You can also save your favourite items to a list and access them immediately if necessary.


EVERYTHING YOU CAN DO WITH THE BERSHKA APP

√ Discover the latest fashion trends
With the app, you can quickly see which clothes will be in fashion each season.
√ Buy all the catalogue items 
Choose the clothes you love and buy them! You only have to choose your payment method, enter the delivery address and wait for your order to arrive as quickly as possible.
√ Create a wish list with the items you love the most 
You can find out which clothes and accessories are on-trend and you can also save the items you like the most to a wish list. You can add items for women and men in the app with a QR code or with a scanner. 
√ Manage your account 
Via your user account, you can review your purchases, track your orders and contact the customer service department with any questions you may have.
√Find new places to shop
The app shows you a list of the nearest stores. You can also see their location on the map and add them to your favourites list or view their details (contact phone number, if they sell womenswear, menswear or both, and the exact address)


Do you like to dress in the latest fashion? Do you like to buy clothes, shoes and accessories for women and men directly from your mobile? Do you want to see all the orders you have placed? Do you want to discover new stores? In that case, the Bershka app is exactly what you have been looking for. 

It’s much more than an online store.

You can shop from anywhere, anytime, and never miss out on vouchers and offers, while always having your wishlist with you - what are you waiting for?

***Inspiring***
- Let yourself be inspired by the latest trends
- Discover styles hand-picked by our fashion editors
- Follow the coolest bloggers and celebrities

***Personalised***
- Find styles that suit you with just one  click
- Get news on topics that interest you every day
- Share your favourite items with your friends

***Practical***
- Keep track of things and add products to your wishlist

- Search for your favourite brands quickly and easily

***Renowned***
- Mydealz Retailer Awards 2019: Top 3 Fashion & Beauty
- INTERNET WORLD BUSINESS Shop-Awards 2017 & 2018 (1st Place: Online Pure Player)
- Retail Technology Awards Europe 2017 (1st place: Best customer experience)

Download the ABOUT YOU app now and shop for your style!

Follow us:
https://www.facebook.com/aboutyouglobal
https://instagram.com/aboutyou/



The following top brands and many more can be found in the ABOUT YOU app:
The North Face, Nike, Vero Moda, Adidas, Only, Naketano, Rieker, Tommy Hilfiger, Guess, Levi's, Boss, Polo Ralph Lauren, Bugatti, Mustang, Diesel, Superdry, Tamaris, Puma, Calvin Klein, Asics, Marco Tozzi

Partners:
Günstiger, Beslist, Kleding, Fashionchick, Stylight, Stylelounge

Comprehensive

Quickly search, get product details, read reviews and purchase millions of products available from Amazon and other merchants.

Convenient
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options. No need to create a new account to manage your 1-Click settings and wish lists, track your orders and use your Prime membership benefits. Shop just as you do on the web.

Fast
Compare prices and check availability instantly by scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing your search. 

Secure
All purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers.

Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp, Amazon.sg from a single app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.
 
For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.com/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

eBay Kleinanzeigen is now Kleinanzeigen!

Kleinanzeigen - you can buy and sell on Germany's No. 1 online marketplace, easily and conveniently with the app for your smartphone!
Find great deals, from household goods to clothing, garden tools, electronics and second-hand items, to apartments and houses, and even jobs. Kleinanzeigen is the flea market app with the best deals in your neighborhood.

Your advantages: 
* Perfect for searching and posting free classified ads in your neighborhood
* Find cheap offers - favorite things at a fair price
* Place an ad quickly and easily: take a photo, write a description, add a price - your classified ad is ready!
* Over 36 million monthly users and 50 million offers in various categories
* Communicate with sellers and buyers directly via the app

Over 280 categories are waiting for you, for example:

FASHION & ACCESSORIES
* Find your favorite second hand fashion by brand, size, color, style and other filters
* Find clothes for women and men, from dresses, sweaters, pants and shirts to shoes
* Buy jewelry, cosmetics, bags, sneakers and everything else that completes your outfit

HOUSE & GARDEN
* Find great offers and facilities for home and garden
* Get inspired by offers for furniture and garden accessories, such as dining table, bed, sofas, couch or lamps
* Save money when buying garden furniture, plants and tools for DIY enthusiasts

ELECTRONICS
* Find electronics for your household, such as coffee machines, vacuum cleaners, washing machines, etc.
* Buy new or used TV or multimedia center at a good price
* Find iPhones and other smartphones in very good condition or look forward to your next game console, such as Playstation or Xbox

REAL ESTATE
* Rent a house, buy a house, rent an apartment or buy an apartment: Your new home is waiting for you on Kleinanzeigen
* Always the latest offers for apartments, houses, holiday homes and commercial real estate, all over Germany
* Targeted search by square meters, number of rooms, features such as balcony, roof terrace and property type

CAR, BIKE & BOAT
* Car, bike, motorcycle, caravan, mobile home or boat - find everything for your next trip and the appropriate accessories for it
* Search by brand, model, body type, engine size, color or transmission type
* Sell your used car, auto parts or auto accessories
* Discover classic cars from Benz, Audi and other brands
* Find your new used bike, whether it's a BMX, city bike, mountain bike or racing bike

FAMILY, CHILD & BABY
* Everything for children and everything that makes family life easier
* Choose between different categories, search for baby clothes, children's fashion, toys, children's vehicles or baby items

JOBS
* Job offers for your new job
* Search by professional field, job title and industry
* Apply to job advertisements for mini jobs, part-time jobs, student jobs

You have questions? 
You are welcome to send suggestions or problems to iphonesupport@kleinanzeigen.de.
We look forward to your feedback on our app. That helps us to improve it, which will make you happy in the end.

Preuzmite potpuno BESPLATNU  iOS cm mobilnu aplikaciju!
"cm" aplikacija pruža potrošačima informacije o najvećem domaćem drogerijskom lancu u Bosni i Hercegovini, kao i najpovoljnijim ponudama proizvoda. Za sve one koji vole darivanje, svakodnevno pratite informacije o nagradnim igrama.
"cm" aplikacija vodi vas kroz aktualne promocije koje se održavaju u cm poslovnicama. Ako želite pronaći najbliži cm, naša aplikacija pokazat će vam pravi put, kako biste čim prije obavili kupovinu bez imalo lutanja..

Aplikacija sadrži:
• najbolje ponude
• pregled kataloga
• novosti
• provjera cm bodova
• lokator poslovnica

Notifikacija:
Sve informacije se blagovremeno dopunjavaju i šalju putem notifikacije za korisnike. Notifikacija će biti vidljiva svaki put kad pokrenete aplikaciju.

Vintage app is a virtual flea market, where you can buy and sell beautiful vintage style clothes, furniture, secondhand stuff or new products. Shop for a variety of items, from vintage shirts, dresses and shoes, to retro games, home goods and used electronics. Discover awesome bargains in your neighborhood or list your preowned items for sale in seconds!

Vintage is completely FREE - no listing, buying or transaction fees! 

WHY VINTAGE APP?
•	Simple and Easy to use
•	Buy and Sell in seconds!
•	Discover incredible bargains in your area!
•	No listing or transaction fees!
•	Meet nearby to exchange your item for cash!
•	Share with friends & local community with Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, etc

VINTAGE MARKETPLACE
Vintage marketplace is an online garage sale (yard sale) application for beautiful used items. You can buy, sell or make deals on used clothes, secondhand bags, shoes, clothing, fashion items, shirts, apparel, accessories, handmade, art and craft, collectibles, baby gear, games, cars, home goods, antiques, used furniture, services, bikes, scooters, books, mobile phones, electronics, consoles, retro games, toys and much more!

SHARING
•	Fast and easy way to share with your friends & local community
•	Share with Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, Viber, Messenger, Instagram, Email

CONTACT US
Want to give us feedback or need help?  Feel free to contact us at support@evintage.io
Facebook	https://www.facebook.com/VintageApp/

Black Friday starts here — score huge deals on the AliExpress app right now. AliExpress brings millions of items across fashion, electronics, home, beauty and more, all in one easy app so you can grab Black Friday discounts, flash sales and app-only coupons.

Find top brands, unique finds and everyday essentials at great prices. Read honest buyer reviews, compare sellers, and use smart search and filters to find exactly what you want. With AliExpress you get personalized recommendations, saved wishlists, price-drop alerts and curated collections tailored to your tastes.

We make shopping safe and simple. AliExpress protects your purchase with secure payments, buyer protection and easy returns. Track orders in real time, get delivery updates, and choose fast shipping options when you need items quickly. Chat with sellers or our support team right from the app.

Don’t miss limited-time Black Friday deals, exclusive app offers and flash events — AliExpress updates promotions constantly so you can save more. Whether you’re hunting for gifts, seasonal styles, or must-have gadgets, AliExpress puts endless choice and value in your pocket.

Download the AliExpress app today, join millions of shoppers, and enjoy worry-free shopping during Black Friday and all year round. Great finds and huge savings are just a tap away on AliExpress.

The ASOS app is home to more than 850 brands, over 85,000 products, free delivery and return options. We empower fashion-loving 20-somethings all over the world to be whoever they want to be.

More ASOS app perks:

• Apple Pay for easy, speedy checkout
• Style Match – just take a picture, or upload one, and we’ll find similar products for you
• My Recommendations, AKA a tailor-made edit personalised for you
• A seamless experience between devices (synced Saved Items and shopping bag)
• Sale alerts and promotional nudges, so you’ll always stay up to date
• Handy catwalk videos and 360-degree views of products
• Delivery to 242 countries worldwide

Ormarić – Tvoja Zajednica za Sigurnu Prodaju i Kupovinu Rabljene Odjeće
Pretvori svoj ormar u izvor zarade ili pronađi jedinstvene komade po nenadmašnim cijenama!

PRODAJTE BEZ NAPORA
* 0% provizije – Sve što zaradite ostaje vaše!
* Prodajte odjeću, obuću ili aksesoare u 3 koraka: fotografirajte, opišite, postavite cijenu.
* Sigurna prodaja uz enkriptiranu komunikaciju - lični podaci i transakcije 100% zaštićeni.
* Brza dostava: dogovorite detalje direktno s kupcem putem ugrađenog chata.

KUPUJTE PAMETNO, KUPUJTE SIGURNO
* Pretražujte hiljade artikala: od vintage odjeće do dječijih igračaka – sve na jednom mjestu!
* Personalizovani filteri za brzo pronalaženje željene odjeće.
* Provjerite povijest prodavatelja i ocjene kupaca prije kupovine.

POSTANITE DIO REVOLUCIJE ODRŽIVE MODE
* Pridružite se 20.000+ korisnika koji daju drugi život odjeći i štite planetu.
* Svaka prodaja smanjuje tekstilni otpad – vaš ormar postaje dio zelene priče!

ZAŠTO ORMARIĆ?
* Najbrži način da zaradite od neiskorištene odjeće – prvi novac za 24 sata!
* Sigurna komunikacija – direktni čet s kupcima/prodavačima bez dijeljenja ličnih podataka.


GLOBALNA ZAJEDNICA NA DOHVAT PRSTA
* Povežite se s ljubiteljima polovne odjeće širom regije.
* Otkrijte inspirativne ormare, pratite trendove i postanite dio thrift kulture!

Preuzmite Ormarić DANAS i:
* Zaradite dodatno prodajom stvari koje više ne koristite.
* Kupite kvalitetnu odjeću do 70% jeftinije.
* Podržite kružnu ekonomiju - budite modni i odgovorni!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ormaric.app/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@ormaric
Saznajte više na našoj stranici: https://ormaric.app/

Upoznajte eKupi mobilnu aplikaciju – mjesto koje okuplja tisuće proizvoda iz raznih kategorija kao što su IT, bijela tehnika, televizori, gaming, sport, igračke, gume te školski pribor i knjige i brojne druge, a donosi vam i razne zanimljive akcije i pogodnosti svaki tjedan.
Sve što trebate napraviti je instalirati aplikaciju, istražiti našu ponudu i moći ćete kupovati brže no ikad, na putu za posao, na odmoru ili kod kuće, u bilo kojem trenutku i bilo gdje.

Collect, shop, save, and win!

The Müller App offers many benefits, such as a digital customer card, coupons, sweepstakes, and more. Take advantage of these benefits!

Here is how it works:
1. Download the free Müller App.
2. Register for the Müller customer card using your email address and password.
3. To take advantage of the many benefits of the app, you need to provide some personal information. Then, you decide which information you want to provide and can choose to activate our notifications.

The benefits and features of the Müller App:

Digital customer card
We reward your loyalty! You collect Müller Blossoms on your customer card by making purchases and referrals. You can redeem these for future purchases and save money. In addition, receive a welcome bonus for your first purchase by simply scanning the app at the cash register.
The app is always at your fingertips and is a digital customer card on your mobile device. Check the balance of Blossoms on your customer card at any time and get an overview of your past purchases in your “Blossom account”.


Coupons & Sweepstakes
In the app, you can see an overview of current coupons from our drugstore and other departments.
Activate the coupons, scan your customer card at the cash register, and save money.
Additionally, you benefit from exclusive sweepstakes.

Other features
Store finder: In our store finder, you can find your nearest Müller store, opening hours, and other information about Müller stores.


Brochures & Magazines: In the brochure overview, you can find and browse the current Müller brochures and our regular drugstore offers. You can also find our customer magazines and get inspired!

Digital receipt: After your purchase, you receive your receipt in the app. This ensures sustainability and is also practical since you won’t lose it.

Automatic Wi-Fi login:
You have the option to agree to use the customer Wi-Fi conveniently from home. 
Once you agree, your device will automatically connect to the Müller free Wi-Fi network every time you visit our shops.

Cross-border use: Use the Müller App in several countries – Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Slovenia, Spain, Croatia and Hungary. You now have the option to change the country in the app. After changing the country, the app content will be available in the corresponding local language.


Your opinion matters! We appreciate your feedback so we can improve our Müller App. 

Use the contact form within the app or write to our app customer service.
Germany: service@app.de.mueller.eu
Austria: service@app.at.mueller.eu
Switzerland: service@app.ch.mueller.eu
Slovenia: aplikacija@app.si.mueller.eu
Spain: service@app.es.mueller.eu
Croatia: aplikacija@app.hr.mueller.eu
Hungary: kapcsolat@app.hu.mueller.eu

Ananas šoping mol a na netu omogućava ti da kupuješ bilo kad, bilo gde i da nađeš sve na jednom mestu. U ovoj aplikaciji možeš pronaći više od milion različitih proizvoda, u preko 30 kategorija - sve što ti treba. Isprobaj glasovnu pretragu, sigurno će te oduševiti. A tu su i posebne ponude i dodatni popusti samo za korisnike ananas aplikacije.




Obezbedili smo sigurno i bezbedno plaćanje platnim karticama na platformi, gotovinom tj. pouzećem prilikom preuzimanja paketa, uplatnicom ili skeniranjem IPS koda. A tu je i plaćanje na rate uz Banka Intesa platne kartice.



Svi proizvodi s oznakom „a brzo“ do tvojih kućnih vrata stižu u roku od jednog ili dva radna dana. Pored toga, svoj paket možeš da preuzmeš na ananas paketomatu na NIS benzinskim pumpama ili preuzmeš u ananas paket zoni - mreži maloprodajnih objekata (kafići, manje trgovinske radnje, menjačnice...). Kako tebi najviše odgovara. (Isporuku vršimo samo na teritoriji Republike Srbije)


Pojednostavili smo i vraćanje robe i reklamacija. U prvih 14 dana, od dana prijema paketa, možeš da vratiš proizvod bez ikakvih dodatnih objašnjenja. Jedini uslov je da proizvod ne bude korišćen.




Preuzmi ananas aplikaciju i uživaj u kupovini.
